Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraAdmin
Namespace: "urn:zimbraAdmin"
VerifyIndex SOAP Command

Verify index

Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required true

VerifyIndexRequest

    <VerifyIndexRequest> ## VerifyIndexRequest
        <mbox id="{account-id}" /> ## MailboxByAccountIdSelector
    </VerifyIndexRequest>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <VerifyIndexRequest> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
/mbox Required (only 1) Mailbox selector
/mbox@id Required (only 1) Type:String
Account ID

VerifyIndexResponse

    <VerifyIndexResponse> ## VerifyIndexResponse
        <status /> ## 0|1
        <message>{message} (String)</message>
    </VerifyIndexResponse>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <VerifyIndexResponse> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
/status Required (only 1) Result status of verification. Valid values "true" and "false" (Not "1" and "0")
/message Required (only 1) Type:{message} (String)
Verification output
